content.description: Atomic's top-tier women's freeride boot is on a tear, and only getting better. The Atomic Hawx Ultra 115 S W GW Ski Boots march on as the most precise fit in the industry around the midfoot and ankle, letting you deliver the message to your skis that much quicker (as well as ski more subtly using just ankle movement). Atomic's Memory Fit process may seem "old hat" after many years, but it still is the premier heat molding technology in the industry and can deliver a remarkable improvement in a boot's fit in minutes. New this season is the Mimic Professional liner, which features both heat molding and foam injection technologies along with fantastic heel hold. All this sounds like more to think about, but it isn't really - just buy this boot and get on with skiing on a higher and more intuitive level. You deserve it.
content.name: Atomic Hawx Ultra 115 S W GW Ski Boots - Women's 2023
